name: Guest User restricted from creating a direct Message or group Message with unauthorized users via slash command

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)

inline.description:
1. Login as a Guest User and navigate to a channel.
  2. Ensure that the guest user does not have access to user1 and user (they don't share any channels with the guest)
  3. Issue the following command:
  4. /groupmsg @user1,@user2 'message'
  5. /msg @user1 'message'
inline.expectedResult:
• Group message is not created and a system message is shown:
    "Unable to find the users: @user1,@user2"
  • Direct message is not created and a system message is shown:
    "Unable to find the users: @user1"

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• Guest Accounts: Guest User is able to create a Group Message with Unauthorized users by issuing a /groupmsg command — MM-18229
  • Guest Accounts: Guest User is allowed to send a DM to an unauthorized user by using the slash command — MM-17919
